type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Composition of the thesis with the assistance and guidance of a supervisor.

objectives.en:
The general objective is to consolidate, enhance and apply research skills developed earlier in the programme and to enhance the students' ability to independently organise, structure and write a substantial piece of analytical text. 
The master's thesis is a result which proves the student's readiness for independent work in his/her specialisation.
objectives.et: Üldeesmärk on ühendada, täiustada ja rakendada varem programmi raames omandatud uurimisoskusi ning täiustada üliõpilaste võimet iseseisvalt organiseerida, struktureerida ja koostada mahukat analüütilist teksti. Magistritöö on tulemuseks, mis näitab üliõpilase valmisolekut iseseisvaks tööks omandatud erialal.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows and understands the underlying principles and ethical aspects of research work;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) tunneb ja mõistab uurimistöö põhiprintsiipe ja eetilisi aspekte;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) has acquired the skills to critically analyse and discuss academic literature;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) on omandanud oskused kriitiliselt analüüsima akadeemilist kirjandust ja selle üle arutlema;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) has acquired the skills to set up and empirically verify hypotheses;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) on omandanud oskused püstitama ja empiiriliselt tõestama hüpoteese;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) has acquired the skills to present their work in the form of a written thesis and orally defend the nature, content and methodology of their own research project.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) on omandanud oskused esitama oma töö kirjaliku uurimustöö ning suuliselt kaitsma oma uurimisprojekti olemust, sisu ja metodoloogiat.

independent_work.en: Under the direction of the thesis supervisor(s) and supervisor(s) of the master's seminar, preparation of the master's thesis from the expanded version of the thesis statement to the defense of the finished master's thesis in front of the committee.
independent_work.et: Under the direction of the thesis supervisor(s) and supervisor(s) of the master's seminar, preparation of the master's thesis from the expanded version of the thesis statement to the defense of the finished master's thesis in front of the committee.

grade_preconditions.en:
1. Submission of Master's thesis for pre-review 05.05.2025.
2. Submission of Master's thesis for defense 19.05.2025.
3. Defense of Master's thesis 27.05.–3.06.2025.
4. Graduation Ceremony 17.06.2025.
grade_preconditions.et:
1. Submission of Master's thesis for pre-review 05.05.2025 before 16:00.
2. Submission of Master's thesis for defense 19.05.2025 before 16:00.
3. Defense of Master's thesis 27.05.-3.06.2025.
4. Graduation Ceremony 17.06.2025.

debt_elimination.en: It is possible to re-defend the thesis in the next academic year.
debt_elimination.et: It is possible to re-defend the thesis in the next academic year.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
